About Me

X

Who am I, Robertas Tamulionis a newcomer in web development. Self taught and up to date!

The reason Why I am so into web developement is because since day one, it only became more and more interesting. The need to know and be able to code more only kept growing. Why You should hire me:
This profession is something i chose for my self.
I put a lot of my after work evenings to become better at it.
I am passionate about coding and i have willingness to learn more, to become better, to constantly improve.

How i learned to code. Private skype lessons with a web developement instructor was the begining. Couple months into studying i continued on my own with numerous online courses from learing platforms. To develop a better understanding of programming languages i coded several projects, some through the courses, some are my own ideas.

Skill Set

X

What i was able to learn to this point
  • HTML - as for the most of us HTML was the beginning of a coding journey. I got the basics from my teacher and than expanded my vocabulary while working on projects and online courses.
  • CSS - this was the first thing that got me very excited about coding. I enjoyed drawing for a big part of my life so CSS was a new way to create for me.
  • SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize - i use SASS whenever i can to write my CSS. I got used to it during my online courses and i find it very comfortable, escpeially when combined with BEM naming methodology. Bootstrap and Materialize, i have never learned these frameworks myslef, however i had to use it through my online courses so i have the basic knowledge of how it works.
  • JavaScript - JS is the part where i spent most of my learning time. I am very interested in DOM manipulation and the way JS allows you to interact with your website. I also spent a decent amount of time on coding some apps (budget calculator, pig game, MyCryptoApp. All found in projects section).
  • jQuery - i have only coded one website using jQuery. I did it just to have an understanding of how it works. However i did not spend a lot of time learning it deeper, because i was more interested in plain JS and how all the functions work under the hood.
  • React - in progress...
  • PHP - i spent only one week to go through some of the PHP course. I wanted to find out what it was and how it worked. I have touched some of the back end programming and found it quite interesting. I would love to learn more about PHP, however i wanted to focus all my time and effort on JavaScript
  • PhotoShop - i know only the basics with photoshop. Had a one week online course about it, but did not want to go deeper due to lack of time. However i would love to learn more about this program because web design looks very interesting to me.
  • Webpack - once i found out about webpack i instantly bought an online course for it. I wanted to know a bit more about how it worked and how to make a custom setup. Now i do.
  • Tools - for my code writting i was using Atom and Brackets for a long time. But recently i switched to Visual Sutdio Code, mainly due to the easy Live Server possibility. For my browser i use Google Chrome. To edit my pictures i am using PhotoShop

More About Me

X

I am from Lithuania. However i have not lived there since i graduated from ISM(University of management and economics) in 2010. Then i decided to move to London. There i got a job in hospitality industry. Bartending and Waitering became my new passion for that time being. I lived there for about 4 years. In the summer of 2015 i moved to Norway. Here i worked in few hotels as a bartender and i am currently working in Son Spa hotel.

My free time goes like this. Healthy life style, and exercise. Trying to crack the code of electric guitar playing. Reading my daily tech news, improving my Norwegian language skills.
